value.title: StarCraft 2 - When a FFA is both INSANE and Smooth Brained | Beast of the Hill
value.excerpt: Beast of the Hill is a mod in Starcraft 2 that was created by Beastyqt where the aim is to occupy the red dot in the centre of the map. For this one, if you hold the middle it is worth 4 bases of mining! This one features our resident Smooth Brain, Santa Claws, and as usual he is up to no good! If you
